entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 a.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
